column4: so uhh, my friend's PC shows a message - An automatic fsck of the root filesystem failed. A manual fsck must be performed in maintenance mode. Maintenance shell started.
what is he supposed to write then?
I suggest booting into a livecd, and fsck'ing all my partitions manually iwth that.
File-system check disk. It basically checks if something went wrong with the partitions and tries to correct whatever mistakes it finds.
